Name: Phainon
Desc: Aedes Elysiae, a remote frontier village isolated from the world, now lives on only in cryptic legends.\nThe Nameless hero, █████, the Chrysos Heir carrying the Coreflame of "Worldbearing," memorizes the ideals of the entire world, carries the fate of millions, and brings the first light of dawn to the new world\n—"But should dawn have never existed, let the fires of rage burn this body to ashes and transform into the blazing sun of tomorrow!"

1.Name: Phainon Eidolon 1
1.Desc: The SPD of <u>█████'s extra turn</u> increases to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of █████'s base SPD. When "Coreflame" reaches the max limit, this unit's Physical <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

2.Name: Phainon Eidolon 2
2.Desc: █████ attacks and deals DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG. When consuming <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> <u>"Scourge"</u> to use "Foundation: Stardeath Verdict," gains 1 <u>extra turn</u>.

3.Name: Phainon Eidolon 3
3.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Phainon Eidolon 4
4.Desc: When using "Calamity: Soulscorch Edict," additionally gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stacks of "Soulscorch."

5.Name: Phainon Eidolon 5
5.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: Phainon Eidolon 6
6.Desc: Max <u>"Scourge"</u> increases by 2. When using "Creation: Bloodthorn Ferry" or "Calamity: Soulscorch Edict," additionally gains <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> <u>"Scourge"</u>. After using the attack from "Foundation: Stardeath Verdict," additionally deals <u>True DMG</u> equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the total DMG dealt in this attack to the enemy with the highest HP.

140801.Name: Stride to Deliverance
140801.Desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Phainon's ATK to one designated enemy.

140802.Name: Let There Be Light
140802.Desc: Gains <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> point(s) of "Coreflame," dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Phainon's ATK to one designated enemy and Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Phainon's ATK to adjacent targets.

140803.Name: He Who Bears the World Must Burn
140803.Desc: Transforms into █████ and deploys <u>Territory</u> during transformation. Other teammates in the <u>Territory</u> becomes <u>Departed</u> and cannot take action, and all enemies gain Physical Weakness.\n█████ does not have his own turn, but has <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> <u>█████'s extra turn(s)</u> with a fixed SPD equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of █████'s base SPD. At the start of the final <u>█████'s extra turn</u>, immediately launches Final Hit and deals Physical Ultimate DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK that is distributed evenly across all enemies.

140804.Name: Pyric Corpus
140804.Desc: Phainon's Talent. When "Coreflame" reaches <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> point(s), Ultimate can be activated. After reaching the max limit, up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> excess point(s) can be accumulated.\nWhen Phainon is the target of an ally or an enemy's ability, he gains 1 point of "Coreflame." When he is the target of an ally's ability, increases CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

140805.Name: Fate: Divine Vessel
140805.Desc: █████'s Talent. When Transforming, gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s) of <u>"Bruise"</u>. If it is during an ally target's turn, all <u>buffs</u> on that ally target will be extended by 1 turn and the current turn ends.\n█████ is immune to <u>Crowd Control debuffs</u> and has 1 Enhanced Basic ATK and 2 Enhanced Skills, but cannot use Ultimate. During his Transformation, increases ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> and Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color>. After attacking, restores HP equal to <unbreak>#7[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. Upon taking a killing blow, █████ will not get <u>knocked down</u>, and will instead restore HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Max HP and immediately launch Final Hit. For every 1 remaining <u>extra turn █████ has</u>, the Final Hit's DMG multiplier reduces by <unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak> of its original multiplier.\nWhen the Transformation ends, increases all allies' SPD by <unbreak>#6[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for 1 turn.

140806.Name: Attack
140806.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

140807.Name: Beginning of the End
140807.Desc: When Phainon is in the team, increases Max Technique Points by 3.\nActively uses Technique by consuming 2 Technique Points to immediately attack all enemies within a certain range. After entering battle, regenerates <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> Energy for allies, gains <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> <u>"Scourge"</u> and <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s). Deals Physical DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Phainon's ATK to all enemies at the start of each wave.\nIf attacking a normal enemy, immediately defeats them without entering combat. When not hitting enemies, no Technique Points are consumed.

140808.Name: Creation: Bloodthorn Ferry
140808.Desc: Obtains <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> <u>"Scourge"</u>, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK to one designated enemy and Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

140809.Name: Calamity: Soulscorch Edict
140809.Desc: Gains <u>"Bruise"</u> by an amount equal to the number of enemy targets present and then causes all enemy targets to immediately take action and gains 1 stack of "Soulrending Blaze."\nWhen in the "Soulrending Blaze" state, reduces █████'s DMG received by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> and gains 1 additional stack of "Soulrending Blaze" after enemy targets attack or take action. Triggers a <u>Counter</u> after all enemies take their immediate actions, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK, as well as additionally deals <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> instance(s) of DMG, each instance being Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK. Then, "Soulrending Blaze" is dispelled. Each stack of "Soulrending Blaze" increases this <u>Counter</u>'s DMG multiplier by <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak> of the original multiplier.\nDMG dealt through this ability is considered as Skill DMG. If "Soulrending Blaze" is still active at the start of <u>█████'s extra turn</u>, immediately launches <u>Counter</u>.

140811.Name: Foundation: Stardeath Verdict
140811.Desc: Dispels all <u>debuffs</u> from this unit, then deals Physical DMG up to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK.\nIn that, for every 1 point(s) of <u>"Bruise"</u> consumed, deals <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> instance(s) of DMG, each instance being Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK dealt to one random enemy. When consuming <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> point(s) of <u>"Bruise"</u>, additionally deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of █████'s ATK, and this DMG is evenly distributed to all enemies.

1.PointDesc: When the transformation ends, gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s) of "Coreflame"

When receiving healing effects or Shields from a teammate, increases DMG dealt by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly within one turn.\nWhen receiving Energy regeneration ability effects provided by teammates, gains <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> point(s) of "Coreflame."
When entering battle or when transformation ends, increases ATK by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).
